ygData.subject: Re: Petition : what hapend
ygData.msgSnippet: I send a copy of petition to verant, and all major boards and as i know al last one other person was done a same but nothing it is true. in meantime i get a lv
ygData.messageBody:
I send a copy of petition to verant, and all major boards and as i know al
last one other person was done a same but nothing it is true. in meantime i
get a lv 20 with my wizard and i have seen on with my eyes what hapnd in
unrest where all other guys helped to kill deep red and all my spells was
resisted. realy frustrating necro helped, druid also, warriors, paladins
magician and we killed a guy i spent all mana and at end started casting
fire shield on fighters and pets to help a battle as last resort what i can
do. Group survived easy and only healing druid spend all mana and one pet
died.

I dont know if this is only valid on lv 20 or if lv 20 is turning point
where start a way where from not a full group can take on a deep red any
more so that it created some wizard inutility in figh lv fights until some
higer lv. this can ansver only somone who get high evough
